~ Facilitating for various clients the development and deployment of destiny-based strategic plans designed to bring a lasting sense of purpose and meaning, which drives higher employee engagement.~ Providing executive coaching for middle and C-Suite level leaders across various industries.  Each of these individual sessions requires the development of unique interventions which are innovated from specific conversations, research, and analysis.~ Of note: Developed and deployed an online 365-day educational program designed to allow customers to interface the day’s educational material through social media, learn a specific concept each day, and then couple the new education with social engagement activities which reinforce the new mindsets.

~ Managing all sales and marketing activities.~ Selecting window covering vendors and managing relationships.~ Leading and coordinating all customer service and installation activities.~ Providing proper administration, licensure and financial management to successfully complete significant improvement projects for residential and commercial window covering applications.

~ Led all administrative, strategic and support functions backing field operations, including: Strategic Planning, Client Relations, Customer Service, Marketing, Human Resources, Accounting, Finance, Statutory Compliance, Safety, Insurance Compliance, Training and Development, Facilities and Equipment Management, Performance Evaluations, Hiring, Retention, Termination, Employee Engagement, Payroll, etc.~ Helped grow the company from start-up status to the largest window covering installation firm in the region, within five years.~ Acquired contracts with New Home Builders, Home Depot, Lowe's, the great indoors, Home Expo, 3-day Blinds, and Budget Blinds as well as many medium-sized retailers.  Significantly, we topped the industry with a 98.5% customer satisfaction rating.~ Of note: Led the development and deployment of a software application designed to handle the intense detail associated with providing service to over 50,000 window covering appointments per year.  This project represented the single largest financial outlay the firm incurred.* Successfully executed all aspects of the project from hiring the programmer - to designing the functionality - and on through to final implementation. * Ultimately, this application provided a significant competitive advantage, cost savings, best in industry customer service and continuous improvement measures.

~ Developed organizational and professional development training programs and change interventions for use with a wide variety of diverse clients.~ Managed and produced results for various consulting engagements, which included:	Leading teams on large scale organization-wide change initiatives.	Facilitating the development and deployment of tiered strategic plans.	Coaching general managers and CEO’s on senior management strategies and staffing.	Facilitating quality teams designed to drive change, quality, and productivity.	Conducting management and leadership development seminars and conferences.	Facilitating team building and issue resolution meetings and interventions.	Designing service development plans and conducting operational assessments.	Conducting and evaluating organization-wide surveys and interviews to pinpoint issues.	Formulating, writing and implementing new policy and procedure manuals.	Directing recruitment and retention of supervisors and staff.	Training and evaluating management teams.	Successfully refining and implementing high impact projects.

~ Conducted various department and agency level audits, surveys, quality improvement groups, productivity enhancement projects, strategic planning meetings and training exercises.~ Led countywide change interventions working directly with elected officials, the county manager, the assistant county managers, and the executive team, helping them to understand and manage the anticipated impact on county operations of various projects.
Attended school full time while working sixty or more hours per week to pay my way.

Robert Douglas

May 9, 2016, Robert worked with Charles in the same group

Robert is a dedicated leader and visionary. He has a positive outlook, is a great asset for a diverse team, and has a keen sense for business. He has an impressive toolbox from which he draws the appropriate toolset for any problem, challenge, and/or opportunity he is assigned. When I worked with Robert on several projects which were designed to produce significant improvements in a highly competitive environment, Robert developed positive business relationships with the target organizations, produced clear approaches, generated significant sales growth, and helped achieve significant ROI through top line revenue coupled with excellence of quality and customer service. I highly recommend Robert for any position requiring a high degree of leadership and sales management.
